Package com.relogiclabs.json.schema

Class JsonAssert

java.lang.Object
com.relogiclabs.json.schema.JsonAssert
public class JsonAssert extends Object
The class provides assertion functionalities to validate JSON documents against a specific JSON Schema.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JsonAssert(String schema)
    Initializes a new instance of the JsonAssert class for the specified Schema string.

    static void
    isValid(String schemaExpected, String jsonActual)
    Tests whether the specified JSON string conforms to the given Schema string and throws an exception if the JSON string does not conform to the Schema.

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonAssert

      public JsonAssert(String schema)
      Initializes a new instance of the JsonAssert class for the specified Schema string.
      Parameters:
      schema - A Schema string for validation or conformation

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      public void isValid(String jsonActual)
      Tests whether the input JSON string conforms to the Schema specified in the JsonAssert constructor.
      Parameters:
      jsonActual - The actual JSON to conform or validate

    • isValid

      public static void isValid(String schemaExpected, String jsonActual)
      Tests whether the specified JSON string conforms to the given Schema string and throws an exception if the JSON string does not conform to the Schema.
      Parameters:
      schemaExpected - The expected Schema to conform or validate
      jsonActual - The actual JSON to conform or validate

    • areEqual

      public static void areEqual(String jsonExpected, String jsonActual)
      Tests if the provided JSON strings are logically equivalent, meaning their structural composition and internal data are identical. If the JSON strings are not equivalent, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      jsonExpected - The expected JSON to compare
      jsonActual - The actual JSON to compare

      public RuntimeContext getRuntime()
